SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_id, sku_number, description, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, replacement_part_id FROM elp_replacement_part WHERE replacement_part_id = :replacement_part_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT claim_id, sku_number, description, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, replacement_part_id FROM elp_replacement_part WHERE claim_id = :claim_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_replacement_part SET claim_id = :claim_id, sku_number = :sku_number, description = :description, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE replacement_part_id = :replacement_part_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_replacement_part ( claim_id, sku_number, description, created_by, replacement_part_id ) VALUES ( :claim_id, :sku_number, :description, :created_by, :replacement_part_id )
